mapper.select: SELECT jp.id id, jp.goods_id goodsId, jg.NAME goodsName, jp.supplier_id supplierId, js.name supplierName, jp.price price, jp.price_unit_id priceUnitId, au1.NAME priceUnitName, jp.size size, jp.size_unit_id sizeUnitId, au2.NAME sizeUnitName, jp.insert_time insertTime, jp.update_time updateTime, case when jp.type = 0 then 'AUTO' else case when jp.type = 1 then 'MANUAL' else null end end type FROM jxc_purchase jp LEFT JOIN admin_unit au1 ON jp.price_unit_id = au1.id LEFT JOIN admin_unit au2 ON jp.size_unit_id = au2.id LEFT JOIN jxc_goods jg ON jp.goods_id = jg.id LEFT JOIN jxc_supplier js ON jp.supplier_id = js.id
